verbose_text: The mitochondrial membrane regulates the apoptosis of Bcl-2 family proteins, and the combination of the protein state will adjust the mitochondrial membrane potential, alter the expression of Cyt C and Smac/DIABLO proteins, as well as the release of AIF, activating the caspase pathway and lead to cell apoptosis; the mitochondria exerts this effect on promoting apoptosis through Bax / Bcl-2 and the regulation of caspases.
